Content: *p75622ra0232*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area2section aanswer all questions.for questions 110, in section a, select one answer from a to d and put a cross in the box . if you change your mind, put a line through the box  and then mark your new answer with a cross .1 the formula for a diffraction grating in the list of equations is n = dsin.which of the following quantities does not have units?a nb c dd (total for question 1 = 1 mark)2 the current-potential difference (p.d.) graph for a diode is shown.currentp.d.0.7v0which of the following statements is correct for this diode?a this diode does not conduct in the reverse direction.b the resistance of this diode in the reverse direction is infinite.c the resistance of this diode decreases when the p.d. is above 0.7v.d this diode does not conduct when the p.d. is below 0.7v.(total for question 2 = 1 mark)
